_comment: Copy this file to config.json to configure defaults
_comment2: The monitor will load these settings automatically on first visit
_comment3: Users can still change settings - their changes are saved locally
_comment4: Per-server option: cacheBusting - set to true if the server has HTTP caching (e.g., nginx proxy)
_comment5: minRefresh: minimum refresh interval in seconds (0, 60, 120, 180, 300, 600, 1800, 3600)
_comment6: Set this to limit load on your servers - users cannot select faster intervals
_comment7: allowCustomServers: set to false to prevent users from adding their own servers
_comment8: When false, users can only monitor the servers you define above
_comment9: UI visibility options - set to false to hide these elements
_comment10: Useful for creating a simple status-only page for your Overpass server
